name: Lily Langtree
content:
Lily Langtree was an entertainer from the planet Kiss. She worked in the Lion system, and later aboard the space station Pegasus XIII located in the Vierge system.
Lillie Langtry , born Emilie Charlotte Le Breton, was a British stage actress. She was the mistress of Albert Edward, Prince of Wales, later King Edward VII of the United Kingdom.
